Facsimile Images

[---]
ἐτελεύτη[σε]
τῇ πρ(ὸ) ιθ´ Καλα-
νδ(ῶν) Ἰανουαρί-
ων

Apparatus criticus

Text based on photograph; Kirchhoff, Kaibel: ἐτελεύτη[σε]ν (Kaibel: vel ἐτελεύτ[α]); Korhonen: ἐτελεύτη[σε]

English translation

... died 19 days before the Kalends of January.

Italian translation

... morì 19 giorni prima delle Calende di gennaio.

commentary

This epitaph, already recognised as Christian by Kirchhoff, has a formula fairly attested in Catania without the expression ἐνθάδε κεῖται and with only the name of the deceased followed by the date of death (expressed with the aorist of τελευτάω) and occasionally the age (but not in this case): e.g. IG 14.551 = ISic001370.

  • Ferrara 1829 392 no.8 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002005
  • 14.0565 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001072
  • 215 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000028
  • 4.9511 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001252
